name: Far Out (Jack Le Hamster)
description:
A game in development produced for #LOWREZJAM 2022.

My goal for this jam was to make a game engine that could support the first Phantasy Star game on Master System. It has a lot of elements of that game: Open world exploration, 3d dungeons,... 

I didn't get to finish the combat system though, so the RPG part of the game is kinda missing. Maybe next time.

I might add that post jam, so please let me know in the comments if you'd like to see more!

I hope you still enjoy.

Keys: ASWD + Space

_______________

Note: All graphics and programming was produced during the jam. For the music, I used some of my old songs produced before the jam.

If you like the music, check out my videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCozc4cZ5N2IyuCYbJviyw5A
